column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Well this place is awesome!! Great time for a group of close friends to enjoy some great food and great sangria! Highly recommend trying the black raspberry sangria! On the tapas side of things
column2: we always start with the potato salad and the always amazing calmari. The braised lamb is just out if this world! So many options at Reeba and wish I could have them all. Once again we had a great time and before we knew it we had killed 3 pitchers of sangria and enjoyed some great food. I will be back of course.
